data.title: Strong Comeback at UK Games Expo 2022 (Part Three)
data.text:
Listen, subscribe & review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or Podchaser. You can also download the episode.

Sign up for our newsletter!

Here's the third and last part of our episode recorded at UK Games Expo.

This time, I interviewed:

Mike Berry from Leisure Games;

Virginia Page from The Role Play Haven, a family of tabletop RPG clubs with branches in London, Cardiff, Edinburgh, and more UK cities with their Role Together initiative.

Jon Hodgson from Handiwork Games, publisher of "Beowulf: Age of Heroes", "Beowulf: The Hermit's Sanctuary", "The Silver Road", "a|state Second Edition", and "The Forest Dragon By Rory Age 9".

Jared Earle from Nightfall Games, publisher of "SLA Industries", "The Terminator RPG", "SLA Industries Species Guide: Shaktar/Wraithen", "Stokerverse", "Demon Dog", and "Harrowval".

David, a volunteer for UK Games Expo.

Thanks for listening to this episode.

Don't forget to check out Paris Gondo - The Life-Saving Magic of Inventorying (also available as physical box sets) and the playtest version of Rosewood Abbey.

See you soon for a trip to Dragonmeet 2022.

Kalum
